actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to target assistance under Section 5 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to areas with populations over 1,000,000.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to stipulate that 85 percent of the funds available for construction or operating grants under such Act for the urban mass transit program shall be made to areas with a population over 1,000,000 (previously such allocation went to areas with a population over 750,000).

titles.title: A bill to target assistance under Section 5 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to areas with populations over 1,000,000.
